inclusion.criterion: PSA > 0.2 ng/ml after radical prostatectomy confirmed at that level or higher on a subsequent test 3 months later
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: PSA increase >2 ng/ml from nadir following radiation therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Kidney function with GFR > 60 mL/sec/1.73m2 and Creatinine < 1.7mg, collected within 90 days of planned scan
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No known allergy to iodinated radiologic contrast media
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to have MRI based on screening evaluation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status of 0, 1, or 2
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment for another malignancy except superficial skin cancer within 5 years
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man with a history of acute urinary retention and a large prostate. He has normal kidney function and no known allergy to iodinated contrast media.
